picked_headlines.summary: Hybrid AI framework enhances decision-making in smart manufacturing.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges technical and managerial interests by showcasing how AI can optimize manufacturing processes, appealing to engineers and stakeholders alike.

picked_headlines.summary: Somos Internet revolutionizes Colombian infrastructure with vertical integration.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This piece highlights a significant product and engineering development, providing insights into infrastructure innovation and its impact on connectivity.

digest:
- *From Code Foundation Models to Agents and Applications*: Offers a practical guide on code LLMs, bridging research with real-world applications. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.18538)
- *Explainable Deep Learning for Brain Tumor Classification*: Benchmarks models for brain tumor classification, focusing on interpretability in healthcare. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17655)
- *Uni-MoE-2.0-Omni*: Enhances multimodal AI with advanced training, achieving state-of-the-art results. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.12609)
- *Dynamic Expert Quantization*: Improves Mixture-of-Experts models by managing quantization, enhancing GPU performance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.15015)
- *Strategic Decision Framework for Enterprise LLM Adoption*: Offers a framework for adopting LLMs in organizations, addressing security and compliance. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.18589)
- *Revolutionizing Finance with LLMs*: Explores LLM applications in finance, improving efficiency and decision-making. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.11641)
- *SAJD*: Detects jamming attacks in AI-integrated 5G networks, enhancing security. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17519)
- *Binary BPE*: Introduces efficient tokenizers for binary analysis, enhancing transformer context usage. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.17573)
- *Advancing Multi-Agent RAG Systems*: Enhances reasoning in LLMs using minimalist reinforcement learning. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.17086)
- *Wireless Power Transfer in 6G*: Optimizes AAV-assisted IoT networks using intent-driven methods. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.18368)
